language.name: English

group.name: labels
group.lit: Please select or type the correct answer.
Look at the [green]correct answers[/green]. The ones you got right are ticked.
Look at [red]the mistakes[/red]. The ones you found are ticked.
Look at the [green]correct answers[/green]. The ones you got right are ticked.
Look at the [green]correct answers[/green]. The ones you got right are ticked.
Read this text then close the window to start.
Click on any answer to see feedback (if available).

language.group: Would you like to see some feedback for that exercise? Do you want to go straight to the menu? Do you want to go to the previous exercise? Do you want to go to the next exercise? Do you want to create a test? (You will lose your work in this exercise.) Sorry, the name and/or ID cannot be blank. Sorry, that name is not registered, please try again. Sorry, that password and name do not match, please try again. Sorry, there are no licences at the moment, please try again later. Sorry, that user name is already taken, please try another. Please type your details. You scored [x]% in this exercise. Please upgrade to the latest Flash player as you may get problems with your current version [x]. Sorry, there is no hint for this question. Sorry, there is no feedback for this question. The licence has expired (on [x]). The licence has been altered or corrupted. Sorry, the licence will not let you run the program. To get a hint, hold down the Control (CTRL) key while you click on the gap. To look up any word in an online dictionary, hold down the Control (CTRL) key while you click on any word. You have already clicked on [x] words or phrases, and this is the limit. Click on one of them again to clear it and then try again. Sorry, your Flash player cannot print. Please upgrade to at least version 7. Jan, Feb, Mar, Apr, May, June, July, Aug, Sept, Oct, Nov, Dec Sorry, that name is not registered. Please click New user to register. Please type your name and click Start. Please type your name and click Start, or click New user if it is your first time. For anonymous use, just click Start. Please fill in all the information. Sorry, the licence is full. To add a new user, please ask the administrator to remove someone else. Sorry, that ID is not registered, please try again. Sorry, that ID is not registered. Please click New user to register. Sorry, your computer has not been set up for recording from the browser. [x] shows you how to make it work. If you have already downloaded the Clarity Recorder, run it now and you will be able to record. Sorry, there is no entry in the glossary for [x]. Please type the password for this account. This unit has no exercises in it. To help you guess this word, here are the letters in it:[newline][tab][x] http://dictionary.reference.com/search?q=[x] http://dictionary.cambridge.org/results.asp?searchword=[x]&dict=CALD http://dictionary.cambridge.org/results.asp?searchword=[x]&dict=L http://www.m-w.com/cgi-bin/dictionary?book=Dictionary&va=[x] http://www.wordcentral.com/cgi-bin/Search?book=Student&va=[x] http://www.chinalanguage.com/cgi-bin/ecdict.php?query=[x]&dbase=ec http://dictionary.cambridge.org/results.asp?searchword=[x]&dict=L You clicked #ca#. Sorry, that name or ID is already taken, please try others. http://www.wordreference.com/fren/[x] http://www.wordreference.com/enfr/[x] Click a correct answer to see feedback for that question. Yes, that is correct. No, that is not correct. There is no feedback for this question. Do you want to go straight home? Do you want to exit the program? This is the end of the course. Do you want to exit? You must type your name if you want your own Scratch Pad and progress charts." This is the first time this name has been used, please click New user to confirm." This demo can only run the highlighted exercises in each unit." This language course was licensed to [institution]. group.name: can only be displayed in English at present
group.lit: This program has been unregistered for too long (since [x]).
The licence has been registered on a different computer.
The licence can only run from a limited range of computers (IP address).
This course should be run from an LMS, but the SCORM api is not running. Please tell a technician if this makes no sense!
This application has been blocked from your website link. Please start from www.ClarityEnglish.com
The licence can't be found. Some webservers hide the file licence.ini. Try renaming it to licence.txt and restart.
The database cannot be read, please try again later or contact your support team.
[x] cannot be read, please contact your support team.
